page.title: 12OUR FAVOURITE GAMES
page.content: 1/.OUTDOOR ACTIVITY GAMES. 2/.DOLLS/SOLDIERS. 3/.CONSTRUCTION SETS. 4/.MODEL TRANSPORT. 5/.COMPUTER GAMES. 6/.BOARD GAMES . 7/.TABLE GAMES. 8/.PUZZLES. 9/.ROBOTS. We voted for our favourite toys.The list shows the results.The votes descend in order of popularity.The top three have the same votes.Number 6,7 and 8 have the same votes. Only 19 people out of 40 own a computer.This may explain why computer games aren't very popular.Fourteen people who own a computer enjoy typing into it.
